events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but my package still hasn’t arrived. The tracking info hasn’t been updated for several days.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer’s description of late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to delivery support specialist Sarah M. to investigate and assist the customer with the delay.
Hello! I’m Sarah from the delivery support team. I understand your order hasn’t arrived yet, and I’m here to help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status with our carrier?
Sure, the order number is 789456123 and the address is 123 Main Street, Springfield. Thanks for your help!
I contacted the shipping company and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. Your package should arrive within the next 3 days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you looking into this and letting me know when to expect the delivery.
We have noted the delay and will monitor your shipment until delivery. Please reach out if you experience further issues.
Just following up to confirm your package was delivered. Please let us know if everything arrived as expected.
Since your package was delivered and there are no further concerns, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
